entry.title: GB2312 报错
entry.content:
造轮子真是毁人不倦阿，最近一直在调试Octopress，终于slides也可以用了，主题也比较满意了，这不，又折腾了一下午的win平台上的配置。

一直以来在工作的地方是Debian，回到家里是Mac，工作的地方还配了一台Thinkpad供开会用，以前也安装了Octopress，记得是可以用，但就仍在那儿了，这配好主题和slides之后rake不同，总报错invalid byte sequence GB2312之类的

心里惦记着Octopress是对中文有点残，但又翻不到哪儿去修改，只好用个笨法子，挨个checkout自己的post看是哪一篇出的问题，后来发现中文字体，标题，分类都没问题，只是有一篇博文在代码块里使用了中文标点符号，更奇怪的是第一次保存后rake可以通过，再rake就报GB2312的错误

一下午阿一下午，就这么过去了。。其实改动很简单，因为Debian和Mac都是非中文系统，所以一开始用就设置了中文环境为UTF-8，反而一开始就是中文的win7小本，一直没有加环境变量。

set了一下LANG，结果是zh_CN

因此 bash set LANG=zh_CN.UTF-8 set LC_ALL=zh_CN.UTF_8 就可以了

entry.title: Octopress on Debian
entry.content:
Recently, I moved all my works and envir. to a new HP desktop, with all new monitors and keyboard(HHKB pro 2 type-s, it's so cool!)!!!

and to continue my blog in Octopress, I have to re-install it in the new machine, here is just some notes:

  • install git

  • install rbenv

Actually I have no idea what's the rbenv..

bash cd ~ git clone git@github.com:sstephenson/rbenv.git .rbenv echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc echo 'eval "$(rbenv init -)"' >> ~/.bashrc git clone git@github.com:sstephenson/ruby-build.git ~/.rbenv/plugins/ruby-build source ~/.bashrc

  • then install ruby and refresh

the default version of ruby could be 1.9.1 in debian 6.0.6

bash rbenv install 1.9.3-p194 rbenv rehash rbenv global 1.9.3-p194 ruby --version

  • install octopress

do it according to the instruction from website and backup your posts

entry.title: Octopress: We were unable to load Disqus
entry.content:
最近闲着手头无聊，看着日剧选了一个.im的域名，手一贱，点了下paypal支付没想到就入了,因为原想着paypal里面没有余额，本来只想点下支付看它会报什么错误，次奥啊...不过也就8.99刀...

书归正传，既然入了域名，就换呗，几百年没有更新的github Page也折腾起来， DNS换完，github加了CNAME文件，睡了一觉搬家完成，但发现disqus不能用了总是显示

DISQUS seems to be taking longer than usual. We were unable to load Disqus. If you are a moderator please see our troubleshooting guide.

在网上搜了一下，翻出来都是两年前的帖子，于是自己看了下源代码，在我生成的某个post里disqus的代码是这样的

``` javascript var disqus_shortname = 'ikumo-shortname'; // var disqus_developer = 1; var disqus_identifier = 'ikumo.im/blog/2013/01/08/a-letter-to-daughter/'; var disqus_url = 'ikumo.im/blog/2013/01/08/a-letter-to-daughter/'; var disqus_script = 'embed.js';

(function () { var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript'; dsq.async = true; dsq.src = 'http://' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/' + disqus_script; (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq); }()); ```

感觉没有明显错误,查看octorpress里 \source\_includes\disqus.html信息

`` javascript var disqus_shortname = 'ikumo-shortname'; % if page.comments == true % % comment %page.comments` can be only be set to true on pages/posts, so we embed the comments here. % endcomment %

// var disqus_developer = 1;
var disqus_identifier = 'http://blog.ikumo.cfblog/categories/octopress/atom.xml';
var disqus_url = 'http://blog.ikumo.cfblog/categories/octopress/atom.xml';
var disqus_script = 'embed.js';

% else %

% comment % As `page.comments` is empty, we must be on the index page. % endcomment %
// var disqus_script = 'count.js';

% endif % (function () { var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript'; dsq.async = true; dsq.src = 'http://' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/' + disqus_script; (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq); }()); ```

仿照disqus里的example将function里disqus_script注释掉，直接使用字符串embed.js再重新generate和deploy就可以了, 目测是没有评论时count.js出错。
